Subclasses of GameInfo in edu.up.cs301.game.infoMsg
 class BindGameInfo
          A message from the game to a player that tells the player: - who the game is - what the player's ID number is (i.e., player 0, player 1, etc.)
 class GameOverInfo
          A message from the game to a player that tells the player that the game is over.
 class GameState
          The state of the game.
 class IllegalMoveInfo
          The a message from the game to a player that the move just attempted was illegal.
 class NotYourTurnInfo
          The a message from the game to a player that the move just attempted was made at a time when they were not allowed to move.
 class StartGameInfo
          The a message from the game to a player that game is ready to start.
 class TimerInfo
          The a message from to a player (typically sent by a timer) that the timer's clock has "ticked".
